@‡∂¢‡∂∫ ‡∂∑‡∑ñ‡∂∏‡∑í ‡∑Å‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑ì ‡∂Ω‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∑è 
Oyage samahara karunu aththa. Mama pudgalikawa MR mahathata,  GR mahathata , SF athulu 3 hamudawata godak garu karanawa mama ounta nayai kiyala man dannawa. Namuth deshapalana washayen me aya ho UNP JVP , SLFP kiyana mun ekekwath epa.
  Kalin reply eke pehedili karala thiyenawa unp aanduwa ekka moka mona widihata ekathu unath palak wenne ne kiyala. Mokada Ranil kiyanne thama mathayata pamanak thindu thirana ganna uddachcha manussayek .
Mama dekka  wipakshaya athulu  siyaluma paksha wala aya me thrasthawaden rata mudawa ganna aanduwata sahaya denna kemathi bawa kiwa.
  Obathuma dannawada danne ne wipakshen hitapu aarakshaka pradaningen warthawak aran janadipathithumata bara dunna idiri wimarshana wedakatayuthu walata.
 Ehema welath ai me rajaya thama kamba adinne. Ai wipakshe udaw nodi inna bawa kiyanne.
 Aanduwath ekka hendai hoddai wage hitiya JVP ekath den aanduwata wiruddai kiyala natakayak ranganawa. Me wage welawaka aandu peralanna nemei ona rate aarakshawa thahauru kara ganna aarakshaka anshawalata udaw deela janathawa rata bera ganna eka nemeida?
Thama thamange paakshikayan wenuwen un un aarakshaka anshawalata bale pennanawa.
Kiyanna giyoth godak dewal thiyenawa  sahodaraya.
 Mun 225 natana wedikawa kadala mun tika gewalwata yewwe nethnam apita  nemei ape daru munuburanta anagatha paramparawata wenne 1815 ehath mehath baineththuwata baye miharak wage batahirata wahalkam karanna. Sewakaalaya peya 8  peya 12 dakwa deerga uneth batahira dola sansindaweeme eka piyawarak kiyala hithenne nedda?  
Hmmm mona de unath api den paksha deshapalanen midenna kaale hari.
Amataka karanna epa muslim palli 2500 heduwet. Shariya wiswa vidyalaya heduwet badurdeenta kele kapanna awsara dunnet. Yuda hamuda muulastanaya chinawalata vikket oya desha hitaishi aya kiyala

@Nirmala Pushpakumari oba kiyana dewal hari et me ratawenuwen kiyala ke gahana ayata ei beri me welawe ekagatawayakata evit hemoma ekatuwela me rata hadanna boruwata ratata adare kiyala pennuwata hemotama uwamana mas raattalama aran ownge ona epakam itu kara geneemata noweda. Paksaya kumak unat me kapati desapaluwanta api kade yanawa kiyanne me rata winasa mukayata gena yanna apit udaw karanawa kiyana ekai

Aththa namuth me anduwe kriya kalapayan aanduwe inna samahara methi amathiwaruntath prashnayak wela neda?
  Hemadema Ranilge hithuwakkara uddachcha  aththanomathika  weda piliwelak yaddi thawath paksha ekathu unata wedakda?
Aanduwath ekka hitiya jvp kaalakannith den aanduwata wirudda wela. Ehew eke wipakshe ekathu una kiyala Badiurdeen,  Asad sali , mujber Rahuman wage anthawadee millejjayan aanduwen nerapaida?
Unge thananthara walin iwath karaida? Banku horu aapasu geneida? Ne sahodaraya . Ranilai Kiriellai Malik samaraweerai ekathu wela karagena yana me aththanimathika deshaddrohi kriyawan kawadawath nathara karanne ne.
Deshapalana ithihasaye deshaddrohi dushithama millejja deshapalana nayakayek thamai unp nayakaya .
Rajapakshala weradi kare ounge bala kaalasimawe pamanai. Namuth rata jathiya wenuwen weda kara. 
  Ape minissu me millejayan gena dena denama nariyata kukul kotu baara dunna wage Ranilata rata baara deela amana thakathiru kuhaka wedak kara. Den samastha sri laankika jathiyama mara baye gehi gehi jeewath wenawa.
